definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Chinese think long noodles symbolize longevity.
sentences.chinese: 中国人认为长寿面象征着长寿。

sentences.english: Knowing we were celebrating the birthday, the waiter sent me a bowl of longevity noodles.
sentences.chinese: 知道我们在庆祝生日，服务业还送了我一晚长寿面。

definition: to celebrate a birthday (of an elderly person)
to offer birthday congratulations (to an elderly person)
(myth.) peaches of immortality, kept by Xi Wangmu/fresh or confectionery peaches offered as a birthday gift
congratulate an elderly person on his birthday/offer birthday felicitations
double happiness cakes, pastries offered by a man to his fiancée's family at the time of their engagement
boiled balls of glutinous rice flour, eaten during the Lantern Festival
